import { Controls, Canvas, Meta } from '@storybook/blocks';

<Meta of={TitleStory} />

# Title

## Overview

Title is a component that display the title of a stories in a section. This component can be used as a replacement for `h3` in storybook `preview` file.

<Canvas of={TitleStory.Overview} />
